Hi Ron, That's too bad. Still fallout from the real estate bubble I suppose=
. In Canada now, back to start a new season onboard my ship in a week. Than=
ks for having a look-see. I am trying to match a koshirae for my Nosada. It=
 is here, http://www.johnstuart.biz/new_page_14.htm  to show what I am goin=
g for. Of course if anyone else reading this knows of one for sale that wou=
ld be suitable, please rattle my cage. Ron, I completely forgot about the K=
TK book and will remedy that soon, after all I have all the others and they=
 always have had something to tickle my fancy. Regards, John

ostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Ron Hartmann" <swords@...> wrote:

>=

lly for me, but sold next to nothing therefore, but next to nothing.
>

ill check the kogai for you but I do not think there is anything in Mino-bo=
ri. Did you ever get my response to you on the 2009 KTK book? Never heard b=
ack from you on that. Are you back in Japan? If so, lucky you!!
> 
> Ron
